description:
This course provides an exciting introduction into the world of tea. It gives an informative look into the history, types, processing and health benefits of tea.  Many people are unaware of the health benefits of tea.  This course peels back the curtains to reveal the types of tea and its specific corresponding benefits.

Looking to lose weight?  Tea has got you covered.  Need improved mental concentration or focus?  Check.  Tea can do that too!

With such a wide variety of tea available on the market today, it is easy to overlook the long and storied journey that tea took to make it to different parts of the world.  This course also takes a look back to tea’s origins in China and its long, winding roads through Japan, England, America, Canada and other places on the globe.

You will also about learn the six different types of tea and other herbal infusions.  Each having its own properties and benefits, this course will uncover which tea is right for the specific ailment or condition you wish to reduce or eliminate

Tea is very powerful as it has the ability to bring people together, provide comfort and purpose.
title: All About Tea
